name: BOSS SPIDER
description: BOSS SPIDER, also known as the group behind LockBit ransomware, is a highly organized and professional cybercrime group. They operate a Ransomware-as-a-Service (RaaS) platform, allowing affiliates to conduct attacks using the LockBit ransomware in exchange for a share of the ransom. BOSS SPIDER is known for its relentless targeting of organizations across various industries.
